subject: Baseball
Deaths (Obituaries)
Shopping Centers and Malls
Office Buildings and Commercial Properties
lead_paragraph: Mr. Jacobs, a major real estate developer, became the primary owner of the Cleveland Indians in 1986 and helped steer the team out of decades in the doldrums.
snippet: Mr. Jacobs, a major real estate developer, became the primary owner of the Cleveland Indians in 1986 and helped steer the team out of decades in the doldrums.
